thread.title: New story trailer released for Sword Art Online: Lost Song
thread.title_full: New story trailer released for Sword Art Online: Lost Song

author: News Zombie
title: New story trailer released for Sword Art Online: Lost Song
text:
Posted on October 19, 2015 in PlayStation 4 News , PlayStation Vita News 
Bandai Namco has released a new trailer for Sword Art Online: Lost Song. The latest video offers a quick look at the story and premiered at New York Comic Con 2015. The follow-up to last year’s Sword Art Online: Hollow Fragment for PS Vita will feature an original storyline set within the follow-up VRMMORPG, ALfheim Online. 
Sword Art Online: Lost Song is scheduled to launch on November 17 for PS4 and PS Vita. 
–
